subsection_name: benh-dau-day-than-kinh-sinh-ba.json_4_Who is at risk of trigeminal neuralgia?
subsection_content: TN pain occurs most often in people over 50 years of age, although it can occur at any age, including infants. The likelihood of TN due to multiple sclerosis increases when it occurs in young people. The incidence is about 12 per 100,000 people per year; This disorder is more common in women than men.
subsection_title: benh dau day than kinh sinh ba.json. Who is at risk of trigeminal neuralgia?
subsection_data:
benh dau day than kinh sinh ba.json. Who is at risk of trigeminal neuralgia?
TN pain occurs most often in people over 50 years of age, although it can occur at any age, including infants. The likelihood of TN due to multiple sclerosis increases when it occurs in young people. The incidence is about 12 per 100,000 people per year; This disorder is more common in women than men.
